text.section:
Subject to the hearing provisions of § 8-712 of this subtitle, the Commission may reprimand a licensee or suspend or revoke a license of a licensee for a violation of this title by an agent, director, employee, manager, officer, partner, or salesperson of the licensee, unless the Commission finds that the licensee:
had no knowledge of the wrongful conduct; or
could not prevent the violation.
Instead of or in addition to reprimanding a licensee or suspending or revoking a license, the Commission may impose a civil penalty under § 8-620 of this title.
The Commission shall pay any penalty collected under this section into the General Fund of the State.
